Reviews.Title: “excellent value!”

Reviews.Content: hotel basic clean staff everyday staff helpful reception manned 24hrs incase couldnt anymore central location close overall excellent value money defo stay

Reviews.Title: “Terrible! Stay away!”

Reviews.Content: okay ive read reviews piece ive stayed 4 times complain stay looking nice hotel amsterdam party 24 hour reception friendly staff name location unbeatable rld 3 minute walk central police station worth cheap price tag varies lenght stay time week definitely recomend fussy type own quirky atmosphere vibe
